DOC.brief_summary: This study design validate Japanese electronic florbetapir ( 18F ) interpretation train program intend post-approval implementation Japan .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Electronic Florbetapir ( 18F ) Interpretation Training Japanese Physicians
DOC.criteria: Japanese Society Nuclear Medicine ( JSNM ) Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Certified Nuclear Medicine Physician Minimal handson experience formal training visual interpretation florbetapir ( 18F ) brain PET scan Minimal handson experience formal training quantitation florbetapir ( 18F ) brain PET scan Prior handson experience formal training visual interpretation and/or quantitation florbetapir ( 18F ) PET scan
